results.title: Effects of metformin on dyslipoproteinemia in non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: A 12-week double-blind placebo-controlled trial to study the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on lipoprotein concentration and composition was performed in forty @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@NIDDM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006951 @@@hyperlipoproteinemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Schneider J. Effects of metformin on dyslipoproteinemia in non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus. Diabete Metab. 1991 May;17(1 Pt 2):185-90. PMID: 1936474
citations.BibTeX: @article{1936474, title={Effects of metformin on dyslipoproteinemia in non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus.}, author={Schneider J}, journal={Diabete Metab}, volume={17}, number={1 Pt 2}, pages={185-90}}

results.title: Metformin-induced changes in serum lipids, lipoproteins, and apoproteins in non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Forty @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@NIDDM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006951 @@@hyperlipoproteinemia@@@ were selected for a 12-week double-blind placebo-controlled trial to study the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on lipoprotein concentration and composition.

citations.NLM: Schneider J, Erren T, Zöfel P, Kaffarnik H. Metformin-induced changes in serum lipids, lipoproteins, and apoproteins in non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus. Atherosclerosis. 1990 May;82(1-2):97-103. PMID: 2193640
citations.BibTeX: @article{2193640, title={Metformin-induced changes in serum lipids, lipoproteins, and apoproteins in non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus.}, author={Schneider J and Erren T and Zöfel P and Kaffarnik H}, journal={Atherosclerosis}, volume={82}, number={1-2}, pages={97-103}}
